projectDetails: name: github-commit-monitor , full_name: telexintegrations/github-commit-monitor, description: GitHub Commit Monitor is a Flask-based integration that connects GitHub repositories with the Telex messaging platform. It receives webhook events for commits, verifies payload signatures for security, and sends real-time notifications to a Telex channel. Deployed on Heroku, it features CI/CD automation for seamless updates.

name: hng12-stage3-telex-integration_formify , full_name: telexintegrations/hng12-stage3-telex-integration_formify, description: Formify is a seamless Form as a Service (FaaS) tool that empowers users to collect and manage form data without the need for a backend infrastructure. With Formify, users can simply embed a URL into the "action" attribute of an HTML form, and the submitted data will be automatically processed and sent to a designated Telex channel.

name: aws-cost-spend-monitor , full_name: telexintegrations/aws-cost-spend-monitor, description: AWS Spend Monitor is a FastAPI-based Telex integration that tracks AWS costs in real-time and sends alerts to Telex to help members of an organization stay within budget. It supports daily and monthly cost monitoring.
